ygData.subject: Re: Half-pages of Tasarin's Grimoire
ygData.msgSnippet: Any kind of creatures. It s random although there is a bigger chance on magic-using creatures. Skara ... From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@trane.com]
ygData.messageBody:
Any kind of creatures. It's random although there is a bigger chance on
magic-using creatures.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 7:17 AM

Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Half-pages of Tasarin's Grimoire


From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

ack.. sorry.. hehe.. replied to the wrong message..

My reply to this one was supposed to be:

What critters did you get all those pages off of? I have gotten a word off
of scarecrows in West Karana, but have yet to find any other research items
anywhere.


> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
> You will find woven armor on Froglocks in the Ogre areas of Antonica. I
> don't think there is anywhere on Faydwer to get it.
>
>
> > From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
